Text:
Please make a video on the child abuse in schools where children are taught homosexual ideals and other sex themes, and suicide!!!

Teachers are enforcing sex topics on children who don't want to or need to know about this, so teachers are becoming paedophiles in the class room.

That is a straight lie. Give me evidence that what you say is true. I'll give you a lot of evidence that your priests, bishops, and pastors rape little kids, but apparently that is ok. Because you would rather have children raped than taught anything about the real world.

And anyway, exactly how does that compare to indoctrinating kids by lying and brainwashing. You are a sick fucking douche bag. You and your god deserve each other.
